title: Lunchbox Guesses Weight + Poetry Time + One Second Song Game
itunes:title: Lunchbox Guesses Weight + Poetry Time + One Second Song Game
description:
Listeners call the show and see if Lunchbox can guess how much they weigh within 5 pounds. Show members write and recite friendly poems for each other. Plus, Bobby plays one second of a song and the crew has to try and guess the song title correctly!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
